Package berlin.hu.cep.connector

Interface RestAPI

  • public interface RestAPI
    An java interface which represents parts of the Kafka Connect Rest Interface. The Interface is implemented to be used by the Retrofit HTTP-Client. Currently only a small part of the Kafka Connect interface is implemented.
    Author:
    Lukas Gehring, Leon Haussknecht, Maurice Lindner, Jost Hermann Triller, Stefan Zabka
    See Also:
    The Retrofit documentaition, Kafka Connect Rest Interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      retrofit2.Call<String> delete​(String name)
      Deletes a connector from Kafka Connect.
      retrofit2.Call<String> postJson​(String body)
      Generates a new connector in Kafka Connect.

    • Method Detail

      • postJson

        @Headers({"Content-Type: application/json","Accept: application/json"})
@POST("connectors")
retrofit2.Call<String> postJson​(@Body
                                String body)
        Generates a new connector in Kafka Connect. Accepts a Json as a String.
        Parameters:
        body - A Json formated string which is formated like a ConnectorPostObject. Should be converted via Jacksons writeValueAsString() method from a ObjectMapper instance.
        Returns:
        A Retrofit Call instance, that when executed sends the http POST message

      • delete

        @DELETE("connectors/{name}")
retrofit2.Call<String> delete​(@Path("name")
                              String name)
        Deletes a connector from Kafka Connect.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the connector to be deleted
        Returns:
        A Retrofit Call instance, that when executed sends the http DELETE message
